name: Don't lose your head (nICOLEdev, Israh)
description:
This game was made for the Minijam89:Pumpkin game jam! 
Story:
You're the only survivor after a ghostly figure attacks!
 Find your car keys and escape as quickly as possible!
Controls:
E to hide and pick up bags
wasd or arrow keys to move
f to pick up a golden item and click on top of it in the inventory 
to scare off the ghostly figure!
